experiences.description: The club aims to share the Lebanese culture with ENSTA Students, through many events and activities.
My job was to organize activities for children ,and visit local families and refugees to understand theirsituation in order to offer the necessary support.
I organized weekly meetings and numerous camps for an average of 80 children. I developed my team work and communication skills, and learned to respect deadlines.
Provide educational assistance in mathematics to high school and university students. I learned to be patient and deliver information clearly in various ways.
Developing a mobility solution for the 2024 Olympic Games to reduce its environmental impact.We proposed a new efficient way to park and charge the car.
